analysisEngineMetaData.name: de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.testing.dumper.CasDumpWriter
analysisEngineMetaData.description: Dumps CAS content to a text file. This is useful when setting up test cases which contain a reference output to which an actually produced CAS is compared. The format produced by this component is more easily comparable than a XCAS or XMI format.
analysisEngineMetaData.copyright: Copyright 2010-2015 Ubiquitous Knowledge Processing (UKP) Lab Technische Universit√§t Darmstadt

configurationParameter.name: targetLocation
configurationParameter.description: Output file. If multiple CASes as processed, their contents are concatenated into this file. Mind that a test case using this consumer with multiple CASes requires a reader which produced the CASes always in the same order. When this file is set to "-", the dump does to System#out (default).

configurationParameter.name: writeDocumentMetaData
configurationParameter.description: Whether to dump the content of the CAS#getDocumentAnnotation().

configurationParameter.name: featurePatterns
configurationParameter.description: Include/exclude features according to the following patterns. Mind that the patterns do not actually match feature names but lines produced by FeatureStructure.toString().

configurationParameter.name: typePatterns
configurationParameter.description: Include/exclude specified UIMA types in the output.

configurationParameter.name: sort
configurationParameter.description: Sort increasing by begin, decreasing by end, increasing by name instead of relying on index order.
